name: Mario-based Tile Scrolling Platformer | Super Mario Advance 4
name_original: Mario-based Tile Scrolling Platformer | Super Mario Advance 4
description:
This is still in development so alot more will soon be added as well as new levels

This is also a scratch game so it has to run in 30 FPS :(

ARROW KEYS/WASD to move

0 to open the editor

1,2,3,4 and 9 to choose the tiles

Q to auto arrange the tiles

E to choose the tile under the mouse

L to switch level

SPACE to place tiles over tile without auto arranging getting in the way

Mobile users cant access the editor but can still play when i find a way to do that in scratch it will be added

When you finish level 3 you need to refresh the page to replay the game in the next update this will be removed

Thanks to Nintendo for the music, sprites and sounds
